newsitem.title: USA: Kansas City Southern Q4 net up on unit gain.
newsitem.headline: Kansas City Southern Q4 net up on unit gain.

text.p: Kansas City Southern Industries Inc said Wednesday an increase in earnings in the fourth quarter ended December 31 reflected continued growth for its Financial Asset Management segment.

The company reported net income of $32.5 million in the period, up from $27.3 million one year ago. The figure for the latest period does not include a $144.6-million after-tax gain from a DTS Systems Inc stock offer, Kansas City Southern said.
The company's Financial and Asset Management unit saw earnings climb to $20.3 million from $12.6 million in 1995.
Overall revenues in the quarter reached $220.9 million versus $198.0 million last year, the company said.
Kansas City Southern is holding comany.
Its shares closed unchanged Wednesday at 51.
